NavigatorCanShare.summary: The Navigator.canShare() method of the Web Share API returns true if the equivalent call to would succeed.

remarks.para: The method returns false if the data cannot be validated. Reasons the data might be invalid include:

The Web Share API is gated by the web-share permission policy.
The canShare() method will return false if the permission is supported but has not been granted.

NavigatorCanShare.returns: Returns true if the specified data can be shared with , otherwise false.
